name: Neon Kart Racing
description:
WASD to steer and drive. Alt+enter to switch fullscreen.

Made for the Amaze Me GMS2 game jam.

Sadly unfinished. I bit off a bit more than I could chew. First time doing anything with 3D, first time really messing with shaders, and my first time making a racing game. If there is interest though I'll finish it up, add a bunch of maps, mechanics, and such. Oh and sound. Totally ran out of time to put in sound. Hope you enjoy what is done so far! And thanks for checking out my game!
